subSections.title: Han character
Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# the [[w:Yu (wind instrument)|''yu'']], a [[wind]] [[instrument]] used in ancient China

subSections.title: Compounds
subSections.text:
{{zh-der|濫竽|濫竽充數|盜竽|竽律}}

{{zh-cat|Musical instruments}}

subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text: From {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=う}} {{m|ltc|竽|tr=*hju}}. Compare modern {{cog|cmn|竽|tr=yú}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref>

subSections.title: Noun
Idioms
subSections.text: * {{ja-r|竽を好むに瑟を鼓す|う を このむ に しつ を こす}}: “to play a bass koto to someone who likes the ''u''” → to do something that doesn't [[suit]] a person's [[taste]]s or [[preference]]s
